Producer: Alex Ashworth, Alison Brister, Andy Evans, Sean Marley
Production Co: Metrol Technology, Ffilm Cymru Wales , National Lottery, REP Productions, Creative Business Wales, Picnik Entertainment, Mad As Birds, Harcourt Capital, Head Gear Films
Synopsis: An archaeologist and an architect fight to re-imagine a future after a traumatic brain injury leaves them adrift from the people they love.
Title: The Almond and the Seahorse
